choices.B: A full backup of the database

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
VM, state... snapshot!

differential backup and full backup are only for backup.

a "configuration file" doesn't provide a "previously state"

questions.question_text:
An administrator is performing an in-place upgrade on a quest VM operating system.
Which of the following can be performed as a quick method to roll back to an earlier state, if necessary?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Definitely B. A. would give you an invalid certificate error, not timeout.
Definitely B. A. would give you an invalid certificate error, not timeout.

Selected Answer: B
TLS certificate generates errors like: DLG_FLAGS_SEC_CERT_DATE_INVALID, SSL_ERROR_BAD_CERT_DOMAIN, ...

folder can generate problem like HTTP status 500 "internal server error"

the concurrent connections can generate "too many requests" (HTTP 429"

the timeout is about firewall rules.

not sure why you would check the TLS certificate as it would be a error that would point to such an issue. example date/time, unknown issuer, certificate invalid. 

Even AWS troubleshooting says check the ACLs

every result will point you to look at your network settings / firewalls first

questions.question_text:
After analyzing a web server's logs, a systems administrator sees that users are connecting to the company's application through HTTP instead of HTTPS. The administrator then configures a redirect from HTTP to HTTPS on the web server, and the application responds with a connection time-out message.
Which of the following should the administrator verify NEXT?

discussion.content: Content Delivery Network (CDN) is a geographically distributed network of proxy servers and their data centers. The goal is to provide high availability and performance by distributing the service spatially relative to end users.

questions.question_text:
A global web-hosting company is concerned about the availability of its platform during an upcoming event. Web traffic is forecasted to increase substantially during the next week. The site contains mainly static content.
Which of the following solutions will assist with the increased workload?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Valid: "DDoS protection" as "QoS on the network...with traffic shaping"

choices.A: Solutions to perform NAC and DLP

questions.question_text:
An organization is hosting a cloud-based web server infrastructure that provides web-hosting solutions. Sudden continuous bursts of traffic have caused the web servers to saturate CPU and network utilizations.
Which of the following should be implemented to prevent such disruptive traffic from reaching the web servers?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Tricky/Malformed question

"API provider rate limiting" can be best solution than "Invalid API token" (seemly valid too)
If you deploy, you should know when the token session expires, but you could not know if you ends the rate limit. Depends on the service you are using.

questions.question_text:
A developer is no longer able to access a public cloud API deployment, which was working ten minutes prior.
Which of the following is MOST likely the cause?
